content: sides of the round 7 fasten_off and cut the yarn crochet the second arm legs and body with peach yarn and hook g/6 4 mm ch2 round 1 6 single_crochet into the 2nd chain from the hook= 6 round 2 6 single_crochet change yarn from peach to blue round 3 blo increase * 6 times = 12 rounds 4-6 12 single_crochet fasten_off leave a tail of about 10 cm and cut the yarn one leg is ready repeat rounds 1 6 for the second leg do not cut the yarn after finishing the second leg using this yarn join to the first leg with a slip_stitch this will now be the beginning of the round round 7 12 single_crochet in sts of the 1st leg 9 single_crochet in sts of the 2nd leg = 24 sts rounds 8-10 24 single_crochet 6 labubu crochet pattern fionadolls round 11 decrease 2 single_crochet * 6 times = 18 rounds 12-13 18 single_crochet round 14 decrease 1 single_crochet * 6 times = 12 stuff the legs and the body round 15 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet through the loops of the arm and body 3 single_crochet crochet 3 single_crochet through the loops of the arm and body 1 single_crochet = 12 fasten_off and leave long tail for sewing assembly 1 sew the head to the body use long plastic needles to fix head before sewing 2 tighten the muzzle to do this use yarnart jeans yarn or any other durable yarn i do not recommend using plush yarn for tightening start by leaving the yarn tail create the tightening by making stitches in the neck area bringing the yarn out near the eye stretch the yarn under the eye then insert it again and bring it out in the neck area to the same point next introduce the yarn one loop to the left or right and repeat for the second eye pull both ends of the thread so that the eyes sink a little into the head 7 labubu crochet pattern fionadolls tie a knot and hide the ends of the thread inside the head with a hook video tutorial on my youtube https //youtube com/shorts/_wbtjjmchj0 2 embroider the nose with pink cotton yarn make 5-7 short vertical stitches between the eyes between rounds 1 and 2 then add one horizontal stitch 3 embroider the smile with black thread and then teeth with plush yarn congratulations your toy is ready if you have any questions please feel free to contact me through my shop i would appreciate your feedback and if you share your project on ig using the hashtag #fionadolls and tag @fionadolls enjoy your crocheting more patterns on my etsy https //www etsy com/shop/fionacrochetdesign on my ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/julia-kor 8
